title: Titansgrave The Ashes of Valkana
description:
You watched the show; now play the game! Titansgrave: The Ashes of Valkana is Wil WheatonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new tabletop RPG show on Geek & Sundry. It introduces an original science fantasy setting that mixes high magic and hi-tech. Written by a stellar team of award-winning designers, this companion book for the Fantasy AGE RPG gives you background info on Titansgrave, and all the adventures you saw on the show. The adventures include new encounters and options that will let you make the story your own. So grab your blaster and ready your spells. Titansgrave needs heroes!
